title: President Donald J. Trump Announces Intent to Appoint Individuals to Key Administration Posts â€“ The White House
content:
Nominations & Appointments			
Issued on:
March 28, 2019
Today, President Donald J. Trump announced his intent to appoint the following individuals to be Members of the Federal Service Impasses Panel:Jonathan Riches of Arizona, for the remainder of a five-year term, expiring January 10, 2024.F. Vincent Vernuccio of Michigan, for the remainder of a five-year term, expiring January 10, 2024.
